verbs.description: Sen. Grassley [V: has] requested all communications between a Justice Department official and Christopher Steele , who put together an infamous dossier on Trump .
[ARG0: Sen. Grassley] has [V: requested] [ARG1: all communications between a Justice Department official and Christopher Steele , who put together an infamous dossier on Trump] .
Sen. Grassley has requested all communications between a Justice Department official and [ARG0: Christopher Steele] , [R-ARG0: who] [V: put] [ARG2: together] [ARG1: an infamous dossier on Trump] .
